text: Trump met with nearly 20 House GOP at the White House to talk about rebuilding the economy amid the coronavirus pandemic and not one of them wore a mask or practiced social distancing. Are they asking to get the virus? #GOPGenocide #OneVoice1  https://t.co/xAuioifZ0e
